title: Giant Fly Glue Trap by Catchmaster - 3 Packs 30 Feet Each Pre-Baited, Ready to Use Indoors & Outdoors. Bug Insect Infestation Sticky Adhesive Scented Green Color Barn Paper Sheet Disposable Non-Toxic
descriptions:
Giant Fly Glue Trap by Catchmaster – 3-Pack, 30 ft Each, Green Sticky Adhesive Barn Paper

Stop heavy fly problems fast with Catchmaster’s Giant Fly Glue Trap. Each pack includes a 30-foot roll of green, pre-baited barn paper designed to capture flies and flying insects across large areas—ideal for barns, waste rooms, animal facilities, and more. Field-tested for durability, these non-toxic, disposable traps are ready to use right out of the box and can last up to one full year under normal conditions.

Key features:
- Powerful coverage: Each roll provides 10 inches of width and 30 feet of length, totaling 3,600 square inches of trapping surface per roll; 3 rolls included.
- Pre-baited and scented: Built-in attractant draws flies to the sticky surface for superior catch rates.
- Ready to use: Just unroll, hang, and let the trap work; no mess, mixing, or setup required.
- Long-lasting performance: Effective for up to one full year in normal conditions; proven in field conditions.
- Versatile placement: Works indoors and outdoors; effective in normal, damp, and humid areas.
- Safe and non-toxic: Adhesive is non-toxic and disposable for simple, responsible cleanup.
- Heavy-infestation friendly: Ideal for residential, commercial, and industrial settings, plus barns, waste rooms, and animal farms.
- Intelligent Pest Management: Supports an integrated, non-chemical approach to reduce pest pressure.
- Color and material: Green barn paper sheet with high-tack sticky adhesive.
- Use guidance: Do not place in areas where rodenticides or snap traps are being used or are undesirable.

What’s included:
- 3 rolls of Catchmaster Giant Fly Glue Trap
- Each roll: 10 inches wide x 30 feet long (per roll), pre-baited and ready to deploy

How to use:
- Unroll to desired length and hang or mount along walls, rafters, or near problem zones.
- Replace when saturated with insects or at the end of the service life.
- Dispose of used material in regular household or facility trash according to local guidelines.

Tackle large fly infestations with confidence using Catchmaster’s Giant Fly Glue Trap—durable, effective, and easy to use across a wide range of environments.
